snippet: Busloads of immigrants who roll into Murrieta, Calif., for processing at a Border Patrol center have been met by protesters brandishing American flags and screaming, “Go home!”
abstract: Murrieta, Calif, is the only place so far that has managed to turn away the hundreds of thousands of immigrants and unaccompanied minors who have crossed border illegally from Central America; as busloads of immigrant mothers and children roll into town for processing at a Border Patrol center, angry protesters carrying American flags force officials to reroute buses to San Diego.
lead_paragraph: Busloads of immigrants who roll into Murrieta, Calif., for processing at a Border Patrol center have been met by protesters brandishing American flags and screaming, “Go home!”

headline.seo: Influx of Central American Migrants Roils Murrieta, Calif.
headline.main: The Town Where Immigrants Hit a Human Wall
headline.print_headline: The Town Where Immigrants Hit a Human Wall
